exercises.title: Passing with movement
exercises.description: A drill to improve passing accuracy while in motion.

exercises.title: Jump Shot Timing
exercises.description: Helps players coordinate jump shot with proper body balance.

exercises.title: Left-Right Feint Progression
exercises.description: Teaches the fundamentals of the left-right feint technique.

exercises.title: Ball Handling Under Pressure
exercises.description: Improves dribbling control while being defended.

exercises.title: Dynamic Warm-Up Routine
exercises.description: A general warm-up routine to prepare for intense training.
